definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: tong1 yong4 chuan4 xing2 zong3 xian4

sentences.english: A design of high speed backplane bus is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一個高速背板總線的設計嘗試。

sentences.english: A list of the bus destinations that are currently defined displays.
sentences.chinese: 此時將顯示當前定義的總線目的地的列表。

sentences.english: Good reliability-It takes advantage of fieldbus technique and error code test function.
sentences.chinese: 高可靠性，它採用了現場總線技術並有誤碼效驗功能。

sentences.english: They think this is how authentication to the bus should work.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲這是對總線進行身份驗證應有的工作方式。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a bus- based flammable gases monitor system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種總線式可燃性氣體監測系統。

sentences.english: A suit of CAN bus based on the existed intelligence control instruments is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用現有控溫儀表構建一套CAN總線系統。

sentences.english: Deploy a bus service and a decompression filter for the Bus off-ramp.
sentences.chinese: 爲總線出站部署一個總線服務和一個解壓縮過濾器。

sentences.english: Deploy a bus service and a decompression filter for the Bus off-ramp.
sentences.chinese: 爲總線出站部署一個總線服務和一個解壓縮過濾器。

sentences.english: The VME bus data collecting system is studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本論文旨在研究VME總線數據採集系統。

sentences.english: The butcher follows the dog into the bus.
sentences.chinese: 殘殺者按照牽轉具進總線之內。

sentences.english: Choose the server or cluster to add the bus from the drop down menu.
sentences.chinese: 從下拉菜單中選擇要添加到總線的服務器或集羣。

sentences.english: This prevents any possible lockup problems that might occur on the two-wire bus.
sentences.chinese: 這就避免了兩總線上發生可能鎖定的問題。

sentences.english: A hardware design of bus control module in OBS edge node is reported.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一種OBS邊緣節點總線控制的硬件設計方案。

sentences.english: An alarm system for residence district based on CAN-bus is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於CAN總線的住宅小區安防系統。

sentences.english: In chapter two, describes hardware system design of the network-stye instrument bus.
sentences.chinese: 第二章闡述網絡式儀器總線硬件平臺的設計。

sentences.english: This system is so designed as to make a two-circuit structure with a cyclic time of 208 millimicroseconds.
sentences.chinese: 該系統設計成循環時間爲208毫微秒的雙總線結構。
